Class RandomCoordinateFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.drawing.RandomCoordinateFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoordinateFinderInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class RandomCoordinateFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoordinateFinderInterface
    This class sets the random coordinates to the graph noces.
